title: Latest updates: Children and man found dead at house in Hinckley - BBC News
summary: man and children found dead at house in hinckley .
man named locally as 43-year-old david stokes .
children were adam , 11 , and five-year-old matthew .
injured woman is sally stokes , aged 44 .
police were called to house in welwyn road last night .
negotiators spoke to man and woman 'for several hours ' .
woman later emerged and police then discovered bodies .
woman in stable condition in hospital .
police not looking for anyone else in connection with deaths .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: our live updates for this story have now finished .

documents.title: candlelit vigil to be held for victims
text: police are still outside the house on welwyn road in hinckley .
neighbours have spoken of their shock .
a candlelit vigil is being held tomorrow .
author: Helen Astle
BBC East Midlands Today reporter in Hinckley

documents.title: reporters gather on welwyn road
text: media from across the country are in hinckley covering these deaths .
author: Helen Astle
BBC East Midlands Today reporter in Hinckley

documents.title: hinckley deaths : what we know so far
text: here 's is a brief recap of today 's events :
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: community 'shocked ' by deaths
text: news reporter dan johnson is in hinckley and has tweeted of `` shock '' locally at the deaths of the two children .
woman thought to be sally stokes was taken to hospital after negotiations with police .
she 's stable .
neighbours shocked by children 's deaths
sad
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: neighbour pays tribute to hinckley dead
text: a neighbour , who did not wish to be named , said the three people found dead were `` very nice '' .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakinginjured woman named
text: the woman , who was injured in the incident , has also been named locally as 44-year-old sally stokes .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakinghinckley death victims named
text: the victims have been named locally as 43-year-old david stokes and his two sons adam , 11 , and five-year-old matthew .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ipcc 'assessing ' their own involvement
text: the independent police complaints commission has sent this statement regarding its involvement in looking at the the three deaths :
leicestershire police notified us early today ( wednesday ) about a serious incident their officers attended in welwyn road , hinckley .
we understand that three people were subsequently confirmed dead inside a property there and a fourth person was taken to hospital injured .
the ipcc has sent investigators to the police post incident procedure to assess the level , if any , of our involvement . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: town to be able to pay respects at special service
text: local media are reporting there will be candlelit vigil for the man and two children who have died at st. peter 's roman catholic church tomorrow evening .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: next of kin told about deaths
text: the next of kin of the three people who have died have been told about the deaths , leicestershire police have confirmed .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your comments : three found dead in hinckley
text: you 've been leaving your comments on the bbc leicester facebook page following news of the deaths in hinckley
pragna raval writes : `` my heart goes out to those innocent children x ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hinckley deaths 'awful and devastating '
text: a resident in hinckley has told the leicester mercury news of the three deaths is `` awful , devastating news . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: in police investigation into deaths continues
text: these show the house where police have been since yesterday evening .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : police appeal for information about tragic deaths
text: here is the full statement given to reporters by det ch supt david sandall of leicestershire police
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: dead children 'both of school age , ' police confirm
text: here is a little bit more from what det ch supt david sandall told reporters gathered by the police cordon .
`` at this stage we are not going to give any details of the names of the children or the male , '' he said .
`` all i can say is they are both of school age . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: negotiators spoke to man and woman 'for several hours '
text: police negotiators spoke to a man and a woman for several hours before gaining access to the property .
a woman emerged with injuries in the early hours of the morning .
the police then got inside the house and discovered the man and two children dead inside .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ipcc informed about hinckley deaths case
text: the case has been reported by leicestershire police to the independent police complaints commission because the force had prior contact with the people involved in the incident .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police took 'several hours ' to get into house
text: negotiators and specialist officers attended the welwyn road property last night .
it took several hours before they could gain access and find the bodies .
author: Helen Astle
BBC East Midlands Today reporter in Hinckley

documents.title: police cordon still in place in hinckley
text: this short video should give you a better idea of the extent of the police cordon in hinckley
breaking : man and two children found dead at house in hinckley .
a woman is stable in hospital .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cause of death still unknown
text: it is not yet known how the man and two children died , leicestershire police have said .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police 'not looking for anyone ' in connection to hinckley deaths
text: det ch supt david sandall said : `` a number of enquiries are now underway to understand what caused the three deaths , and the circumstances surrounding the events of last night in the house .
`` whilst we are not , at this stage , looking for anyone in connection with what happened , we would like to hear from anyone who may have information for us . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man and children found dead at hinckley house
text: police have confirmed they were called to a house in welwyn road at about 21:30 last night .
in the early hours of this morning , an injured woman was found and taken to hospital .
a man and two children were found dead at the property .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingthree found dead in hinckley
text: police have confirmed a man and two children were found dead at a property in hinckley , the hinckley times reports .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : humberstone gate crash
text: this shocking footage shows the moment a car ploughed into pedestrians in humberstone gate in leicester yesterday evening .
a 21-year-old man has been arrested and police are still appealing for witnesses .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ranieri up for top award
text: quite right too
author: Calum McKenzie

documents.title: fresh call for witnesses to humberstone gate crash
text: police say they still want to hear from anyone who saw a car mount a pavement and hit pedestrians in humberstone gate in leicester last night .
the force said : `` we know there were lots of people in the area at the time of the collision and if you 've not already spoken with officers then please get in touch . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: car park death accused appear in court
text: two men have appeared before magistrates charged with conspiracy to murder promise ndlovu .
ramandeep dhaliwal , 34 , and kehar hayer , 55 , both of spencefield lane , leicester , have been remanded in custody .
a crown court date has been set for later this month for a further hearing .
author: Jo Hollis
BBC Radio Leicester reporter at Leicester Magistrates' Court

documents.title: leicester 'making themselves at home ' on the continent
text: city fans have found a home in copenhagen .
author: Ian Stringer
BBC Radio Leicester Foxes commentator in Denmark

documents.title: denmark welcomes returning star
text: i think we know who any non fc copenhagen-supporting danes are rooting for tonight
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police presence remains in hinckley
text: east midlands today reporter helen astle has sent this pic from the edge of the police cordon at that `` serious '' incident in hinckley .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man arrested following 'ten pin bowling ' crash
text: a 21-year-old man has been arrested in connection with the crash on humberstone gate in the city last night .
one woman remains in the leicester royal infirmary having been injured in the crash , while three men have been discharged .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : november across rutland
text: some beautiful autumnal colours in this pic from bbc weather watcher andy 's rutland in empingham .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tigers confirm anglo-welsh cup captain
text: november does n't just bring with it darker nights and colder starts - it also signals the return of the anglo-welsh cup to warm the cockles .
usually a chance to see some of tigers ' fringe players get a game , the club has confirmed captain matt smith will lead the club through this particular campaign .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

text: woman 'stabbed boyfriend in blind panic '

documents.title: force called out last night to hinckley incident
text: leicestershire police told bbc radio leicester its officers went to the property at the centre of the incident in hinckley at 21:30 yesterday .
we 're still awaiting further details .

we hope you wo n't need the copenhagen police during your visit , but if you do , call 114 .

documents.title: 'serious ' police incident in hinckley
text: officers are currently dealing with a serious incident in hinckley , leicestershire police have said .
the force were called to an address in welwyn road in the town last night and the street is currently closed .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: foxes must 'respect ' danes , ranieri says
text: here is a little bit more from claudio ranieri ahead of his side 's potentially historic night in copenhagen .
`` we can write a new chapter of leicester 's story , '' the 65-year-old said .
`` it 's important to be well organised as i respect copenhagen a lot . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: two charged over car park death
text: two charged over car park death

documents.title: four more arrested over car park death
text: police have arrested four more people in connection with the murder of promise ndlovu , who was found dead in a leicester car park .
a 36-year-old man was detained on sus of murder and the other three men have been held on sus of conspiracy to murder .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

victory for the foxes over fc copenhagen will see them qualify for the last 16 of the champions league .

documents.title: pedestrians hurt in 'ten pin bowling ' crash
text: police are continuing to investigate an incident when a car mounted a pavement and ploughed into a group of pedestrians in leicester last night .
eyewitnesses told the bbc they saw a car with a smashed windscreen being driven `` erratically '' after the crash .

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to wednesday across leicestershire .
i 'll be with you until later with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you want to share any or stories then please get in touch via facebook , twitter or email .
